languages.text: "Ты обещал, что я постигну страсти истинных эльдар. Этого не произошло".
"You promised that I would comprehend the passions of the true Aeldari. That has not happened."
languages.original_text: "Ты обещал, что я постигну страсти истинных эльдар. Этого не произошло".

traits.locale_text: "You promised that I would comprehend the passions of the true Aeldari. That has not happened."
"You promised that I would comprehend the passions of the true Aeldari. That has not happened."
"You promised that I would comprehend the passions of the true Aeldari. That has not happened."
"You promised that I would comprehend the passions of the true Aeldari. That has not happened."

languages.text: “你答应过我，要让我体会到真正的艾达灵族的激情，但我并没有体会到。”
languages.original_text: "You promised that I would comprehend the passions of the true Aeldari. That has not happened."

traits.locale_text: “你答应过我，要让我体会到真正的艾达灵族的激情，但我并没有体会到。”

languages.text: «Prometiste que comprendería las pasiones de los verdaderos Aeldari. Y eso no ha ocurrido».
languages.original_text: "You promised that I would comprehend the passions of the true Aeldari. That has not happened."

traits.locale_text: «Prometiste que comprendería las pasiones de los verdaderos Aeldari. Y eso no ha ocurrido».

languages.text: « Vous m'aviez promis que je comprendrais enfin les passions de véritables Aeldaris. Ce n'est pas le cas. »
languages.original_text: "You promised that I would comprehend the passions of the true Aeldari. That has not happened."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'aviez promis que je comprendrais enfin les passions de véritables Aeldaris. Ce n'est pas le cas. »

languages.text: "Ihr habt mir die wahren Leidenschaften der Aeldari versprochen. Das ist aber nicht passiert."
languages.original_text: "You promised that I would comprehend the passions of the true Aeldari. That has not happened."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mir die wahren Leidenschaften der Aeldari versprochen. Das ist aber nicht passiert."

languages.text: 「お前は、{mf|俺|私}がアエルダリの情熱を真の意味で理解できるようにすると約束した。それはまだ果たされていない」
languages.original_text: "You promised that I would comprehend the passions of the true Aeldari. That has not happened."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は、{mf|俺|私}がアエルダリの情熱を真の意味で理解できるようにすると約束した。それはまだ果たされていない」

languages.text: "Gerçek Aeldarilerin tutkularını anlayabileceğime söz vermiştin. Ancak böyle olmadı."
languages.original_text: "You promised that I would comprehend the passions of the true Aeldari. That has not happened."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçek Aeldarilerin tutkularını anlayabileceğime söz vermiştin. Ancak böyle olmadı."
